answers.answer: Hi hun. I had it but mine was extreme to the point where I had to inject myself with insulin. I only had it when I was pregnant and it left when I had bubba. I was induced 2 weeks early cause it was dangerous for baby. You need to keep an eye on what you eat.
I just found out I failed my 1 hour by 3 points.... My 3 hour is next week and I'm nervous :/
O wow. I hope none of that happens to me. I've had the WORST luck so far with my pregnancy. :-/

question: Has anyone's else had gestational diabetes? I'm 29w4d and am going in to have my glucose test on Thursday morning cause I was told I might have it. I just wanna know how other mommies have handled it and the best way to manage it. Tia.
title: gestational diabetes?
